title: Cool Goal!
description:
Soccer for everyone! Show off your best kicks in Cool Goal, the action-packed football game that always hits the back of the net! Your task? Shoot and score! Dodge countless enemy players, curve your ball like a football superstar, and nail a perfect goal! Explore near-endless free football games in Cool Goal now!

To play, you need to define the angle of your soccer strike and ensure that you time it perfectly so that you don't hit any obstacles or opposing players. Sound simple? Think again! Enemy players are going to pull all kinds of crazy tricks! You're going to need lightning-fast reactions, logic skills, and serious football knowhow to come out on top of each penalty shootout. 

You'll be able to hit the ball with ease, as you master the perfect soccer kick and turn the keeper's goal games around. You'll find it so simple you'll never want to play football any other way. Before you know it, you'll be able to score goals under any amount of pressure and even shoot a ball of fire so hard that nothing will be able to stop it! You're the striker, and nobody will get in your way as you kick balls and take names in awesome Cool Goal games.

As you progress through each level, you'll collect gold coins and keys which you'll use to unlock new skins and football heroes. With so much to explore compared to other free soccer games, you won't be running out of fresh soccer content any time soon. 

Get new skins for your soccer ball, and dress like the stars so that when you land the ultimate soccer strike, you land it in style. Once you've unlocked three keys, you can choose to use them to open reward caches for even more soccer goodies. The more you put into Cool Goal, the more you'll get out of this jam-packed ball game that will send you across the world as you kick balls from beaches to snowcapped peaks!

If you love soccer and you've been on a football strike, this will bring you back to the beautiful game because this is more than 'just' football, this is more than your average soccer game, this is Cool Goal! Get ready to face a variety of football shootout challenges across thousands of levels that present different styles of penalty shots, ball games, and the occasional free kick. 

So, have you got what it takes to land crazy soccer kicks and shoot balls across the world? Put on your soccer kicks because there's only one way to find out, it's Cool Goal time! Use your brain as well as your boot as you dodge obstacles to land the penalty kick of a lifetime. 

Say goodbye to boring free soccer games and say hello to a whole world of entirely free ball games. Experience the joy of sport like never before, because this penalty shootout isn't like any other football game. Cool Goal is the soccer shootout of your dreams!

comments: Downlaod if you have a good phone; game tends to not respond on older phones. Way to many ads and overall an annoying game having to deal with. This is a good game, but it needs to be better.

This game is absolutely amazing because you can practice your aim,customize your character, and earn coins to buy characters. I definitely recommend this. Go ahead and install it. Don't be afraid üòäüòöü•∞üòç‚ô•Ô∏è

Actually, it's a good game, almost great too. But it would be perfect if it could be made lighter version. I played on Oppo A37fw, I almost felt the excitement but then the RAM couldn't bear with it and got forced shut down. Ohh... I wish I can play this game in this old phone of mine.

Unplayable. For every 20 second of game time there is a 60 second commercial. I get that it's how they make money in the free version but this is taking it 500 steps further than any other free game I've played.

This game is really fun and all the levels are so fun. This game is for people who like to play soccer on their phones and also for girls who like soccer games. I've just updated it and I'm going to play it right now so good bye.

comments: Have a really old Toshiba Thrive Tablet that has was the best of the best in it's day. It has built in ports, jacks & features that You just can't get anymore. But It's been constantly crashing like every 10 secs for years now. So it was essentially left unusable. I even researched a way to download a newer version of Android OS, it helped a lil but was still mind numbingly slow to try to operate, until I downloaded this app that is. Not only has it allowed me to run the tablet for over 2 hrs now W/O a single crash, but I would've never been able to run it this long on the battery before. Since it is the original battery that is like 10 yrs old now.....lol Extremely satisfied USER!!!!!

Woe...this app is a trip!!! Jus' installed it, first clean went down to 84f..played a game for couple of hrs,went in this app to cool it down, it wasn't that hot after gaming, so app did it's thing and when it was done, the freakin' temp. read 191.f!! what the f*@k!! I... dunno....?!?!? Sorry develps...but thanx for your hard work!!!!

Cooled it down? AFTER cooling it said that my temperature was 204.5¬∞F. AND that that was okay! What?! It may have cooled the phone slightly, but being THAT inaccurate about the temperature is unacceptable. I should probably have only given it 2 stars, but the phone did get cooler. Maybe keep it and see what happens, otherwise I will delete it and try something else.

My phone was always shutting down. I didnt even use it much and as soon as I would it would close everything due to "device overheating"and would not charge for same reason. Since installing this app it hasn't happend once and I dont even have to use it every day. I had tried several other cooling apps with no luck

Feb,16,2020 The app still works but has slowed down alot since dwld over week ago. There also isnt many options to do anything to modify to keep it cooling or which apps to keep closed and not closed. If developers continue to update and bring new options, fix bugs to app will go back to 5 stars. Do really appreciate the no ads feature though!

comments: I could not even get to use the App due to popups. The first time I opened this App, a popup came up, and there was no way to exit the popup, there was no (X) in the upper corners, nor a Close. I had to use the back button thinking that it would just close the popup, but it closed the whole App. After giving it a few more tries, but only to be interrupted by popup ads.

The app doesn't read the temperature of the phone and it has a premade pattern it follows instead. I tested this by first installing the app when my phone was incredibly hot and over heating, checked the temp, and let my phone chill in the cold for a couple of hours with no use. Checked the temp when my phone was cold as a brick and the temperature remained the same.

Cooled phone but couldn't turn it off. Wasn't happy about it popping up when I unlocked my phone. Couldn't find any settings that would allow me to decide on when it would be launched. Cooled my phone and uninstalled. Not worth it when I can't control when it appears.

Thanks a bunch was having issues with phone overheating during charging time and looked online and viola there you were.. Gave you guys a try and it worked like a charm.. Would definitely recommend to all who are struggling with same issue.. Thanks again and Have a very Happy New Year!!!üòä

title: Cooling Master - Phone Cooler Free, CPU better
description:
Professional temperature monitoring and controlling app that detects and closes heavy resource consuming apps to reduce CPU usage and lower phone temperature. 

Features (Totally Free):

‚úìReal-time temperature monitoring
Monitors and logs device temp. in real time, and displays temp. change curves.

‚úìDynamic overheating detection
Analyzes CPU usage dynamically, and detects apps that are overusing system resource to determine the cause for phone overheating.

‚úìOne tap to cool down
Close overheating apps with one simple tap to reduce CPU usage.

‚úìOverheating prevention
Closes apps that are likely to cause temperature rise, and prevents the phone temperature from rising again.

The features listed above are available for free.

Please contact us at coolermaster.team@gmail.com if you have any questions or suggestions.

I did Rate this App, 5 Stars, However I am changing my Mind. This App still looks Impressive, But, the Cooling ONLY Works if you Perform Cooling after a ReStart of your Device. NOT Worth the Subscription Price.

I'm literally just comparing filters. I don't need to be asked that 12 times in 3 filters damn. Though from what I can see it is one of the better free versions of a video editor on the play store.

Well, I just got it, 2 minutes ago. It's not bad haven't tested all of it yet because it keeps popping up a penguin, asking me to rate it. Which I get why, but I press later because I'm still trying it out and it pops up again. Otherwise it's great so far, I think. I'll update later when I'm done editing.

I would love to rate this 5 stars but unfortunately as great of an app it is, I was trying to make an edit and I'm 2 hours into making it and the app just exits out. I lost all my progress and now I cant even do what I needed to do. it was looking great. it has nice effects and transitions and then all my progress is just gone. I'm beyond angry and I'm going to be honest, on the verge of a mental breakdown because it was something very important and now 2 hours of my life have been wasted.

title: Cool Reader
description:
eBook reader. Supports epub (non-DRM), fb2, doc, txt, rtf, html, chm, tcr, pdb, prc, mobi (non-DRM), pml formats. 

Pages or scroll view. Page flipping animation.
Table of contents, bookmarks, text search. 
Bookmarks on text fragments (comments or corrections) - useful for proof reading.
Export of bookmarks to text file.
Built-in file browser, quick recent books access. 
Online catalogs (OPDS) support.
LitRes online book store support.
Text to Speech (TTS) support.
Hyphenation dictionaries; 
Most complete FB2 format support: styles, tables, footnotes. 
Additional fonts support (place .ttf to /sdcard/fonts/)
Support for Chinese, Japanese, Korean languages; autodetection of TXT file encoding (GBK, Shift_JIS, BIG5, EUC_KR).
Day and night profiles (two sets of colors, background, backlight levels). 
Brightness adjustments by flick on left edge of screen.
Background texture (stretched or tiled) or solid color.
Paperbook-like page turning animation or "sliding page" animation.
Dictionary support (ColorDict, GoldenDict, Fora Dictionary, Aard Dictionary).
Customizable tap zone and key actions.
Autoscroll (automatic page flipping) - start using menu/goto/autoscroll or assign action Autoscroll on key or tap zone; Change speed using volume keys or bottom-right and bottom-left tap zones; stop - tap any other tap zone or key.
Can read books from zip archives.
Automatic reformatting of .txt files (autodetect headings etc.)
Styles can be customised in wide range using external CSS.
Select text using double tap (optional).

Place additional textures to /sdcard/.cr3/textures/ -- to be used as tiled page backgrounds.
Place additional textures to /sdcard/.cr3/backgrounds/ -- to be used as stretched page backgrounds.
(/cr3/ directory can also be used instead of /.cr3/, and internal SD or internal storage instead of /sdcard/)

CoolReader requires following permissions:
WAKE_LOCK - to control screen backlight
WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE - to access SD card
INTERNET - to use online catalogs

CoolReader is free, open source (GPL), multiplatform project.
Project homepage on SourceForge is http://sourceforge.net/projects/crengine/
To donate this project, you can buy Cool Reader Gold ($10), Silver ($3) or Bronze ($1) Donation package from Market

In case of issues after update (e.g. crashes while reading) try to remove directory SD/.cr3/cache and book database files SD/.cr3/*.sqlite

Windows version can be downloaded here:
http://sourceforge.net/projects/crengine/files/CoolReader3/cr3-newui-opengl/cr3-win32-qt-opengl-3.3.48.zip/download

As well, consider using "Cool Reader GL" - cross-platform Cool Reader version with UI rewritten in C++, with hardware acceleration based on OpenGL. Optimized for new devices with big high resolution screens. Both versions can be installed together.

Project homepage: https://github.com/buggins/coolreader

comments: 9 levels in but i have to say so far im loving it. Graphics are great. The colors... the brightness . I dont know how to explain it. It gives me a happy feeling. The only bad thing i have to complain about is the ads üò™üò™ other than that the game is fantastic! UPDATE - couple of complaints.. more than 1 box prize. If im gonna spend 30 stars for a box i want more than 1 prize. -being able to skip end of level. Too much waiting. Sometimes i feel like it will never end

This was a good game. It still needs work. I accidentally opened the game with my data on and just after it went to a commercial and the screen went black. Turned it on and off, and nothing. For some reason it just does better without the wifi or data. It still plays commercial it just has less glitches. I uninstalled for now. Will try again later.

Great way to pass the time. Tho it's like any other match3 there is no tutorial for the "strains" you buy. What are they for? Also when it says to collect a "joint" it's actually cherries. And when you swap a "color bomb" with another special it doesn't explode right away.

I started playing this game on one of my other tablets and it messed up..so when I got me a new one, I had to redownload this game and and I started over because it's a real fun game. I have the adds but it's still worth the play.

I enjoy it so far my boyfriend has been playing the game for awhile and I helped him but decided I liked it enuff to start my own game and I've found I do enjoy it pretty good..all true but I do have several issues with the game that bother me. I don't want to stop playing the game especially since I've made it thru 540 levels but some things need changed to help players have more options to expand and improve their money and hemp strains + adding power ups like you designed in bubble weed match

title: Cool Brick Breaker
description:
Break thousands of bricks through lots of levels of increasing difficulty with this classic retro style game!
- Cool Brick Breaker is an addictive free game with great graphics and music that includes many items, bonuses and power-ups such as multiball, expand paddle, laser and much more!
- Touch the screen to release the ball and move the paddle.
- You can control the trajectory of the ball making it bounce on different parts of the paddle.
- Prevent the ball from falling through the bottom of the screen and remove all the bricks to pass to the next level.
- Try to get the highest score!
- Press the Back or Menu button on your phone or tablet to pause the game. You can also enable a pause button in the Options menu.

GAME ITEMS AND BONUSES
- Expand the paddle.
- Shrink the paddle.
- Reduce the speed of the balls.
- Increase the speed of the balls.
- Give the player an extra life.
- Split each ball into three balls (multiball).
- Add to the score the number of points inside the item.
- Subtract to the score the number of points inside the item.
- Temporarily obscure the level.
- Temporarily make the balls do not bounce when destroying blocks.
- Temporarily create a wall of indestructible blocks at the bottom.
- Temporarily stick the balls to the paddle until the player touches and releases the screen.
- Temporarily make the paddle shoots two lasers.

If you enjoy other brick breaking games, you will love this cool one!

comments: Great time killer. I have to keep my device charged up because it does kill the Battery life. Other than that, awesome game.
I'm sure this would have been a great game, but the dressing off the second stage was so absurd that i don't even want to fathom how stupid the remaining levels will get.
Great game, no issues after 3-4 hours of playing!

The game is nice, but the adds should be at the top,  not at the bottom, to ease the paddle.movement. Also, to restart the game i must press 6 buttons every time,. As I progress, my score gets higher and it asks "enter high score" >  "OK"  > "Main Menu " > "add  X"  > "new game" > play. There should a simple restart button.

Uninstalled in 5 mins. Too many items that keep falling from the bricks, my focus remains all the time on the bat because of so much distraction. Could not watch the ball breaking the balls wirh so much attention on the falling items. So no fun at all with this game. Classic brick brekers are more enjoyable.

comments: Really like, but there are a couple of things that I wish were different. Like, they have the Font Size button/option, but you can never change the font size; every time you try, it says "Font Size Cannot be Changed." Why have it if you can't change it?? Also, I do understand ads... if it was a game or something, but this is for notes and organization; I shouldn't have to watch ads or see them at the top of the screen when I need to make a note of something or make my grocery list.

I like this app because, I think that it is really helpful to the people who have a really busy schedule! Also i think it is a wonderful because it helps you get your thoughts in order and spread everything out into one app instead of having multiple apps to look after!

On the "To do list" the set reminder could use more options for reminding. There's no set starting and stop option or all day reminder. Plus no option for notifications sounds to choose from your device setup. However the app is good. But needs more options, bells and whistles ‚ò∫Ô∏èüëç

Awesome application for your to-do tasks, business meetings, hangouts,etc. I would highly recommend this as that you could turn on the alarms and off, type in the future events, and so much more. This is the best app I've ever encountered so far in memos and notes, and again I strongly recommend this app. Beginner planners, use. this. app. BEST. APP. EVER. And Pro Data Doctor, your gift of making and coding apps for memo and notes really stretches. Keep up the hard work!

I really enjoy this very versatile and well organized app. Really, it's the best all purpose app for keeping track of appointments, making lists, jotting down notes, and keeping track of household chores. It's easy, fun, and colorful, and even has voice memo capability. Kudos to the developer...well done! Definitely 5 Stars.

comments: This started out super fun but then I noticed a few things: first a lot of the facts ran off the page with no way to see the rest of the fact. Then sometime after the 5100th fact or so your facts repeat themselves over and over to the point of total disapointment. You state over 10,000 facts but when its just a buttload of repeated stuff you really dont have 10,000+ individual facts deleting.

Very interesting and I was surprised to actually see facts that I hadn't already heard before on other similar type apps especially being that I've downloaded tons of apps that are factoid apps are life back apps and this app has quite a few facts I'd never heard before.

I have always been a person that likes unusual facts and this app is perfect for that. The only thing to fix is when the words go to all the way to the bottom and then there's no way to finish reading it. You can not scroll up or down because all you get is the next fact. comments: I think this app does a pretty good job, it has features included which work, and the CPU cooler is great, I installed it a few days ago and I'm impressed with the job it does, I'll be keeping it installed, unless something changes to the app, hopefully not.

No good. Plenty of competition has better. Features and more No, thank you. The permissions are ridiculous. The PlayStore said they were getting rid of apps that ask for these kinds of permissions. Unbelievable only Android Q can stop them. From stealing information from other apps on your device This is why they're supposed to stop these apps from doing this. Because now you can see and control them.
Great app! Only one I've found which tells you the actual temperature, while others just show the spinning fan. Works on Android 9 as well as 7. I've used it on both.

My review was deleted apparently, so I will write it again. The ads in this app are horrendous. After cool down it'll be fine but after viewing a 3 second ad, my phones temperature shoots two or three degrees. Uninstalling and will be informing other not to download.
This is an all around great app. Very simple to use and very effective. Does have ads but not to many to be annoying.

title: Cool Ride-Pooling
description:
Cool Ride-Pooling is here to take you to the next level of mobility. Whether it is commuting to work, going out to dinner or meeting friends out, Cool provides you with a simple and affordable way to get to your desired destination!
 
Cool is an on-demand, innovative, and inexpensive alternative to taxis, cabs or public transport in Malta. Just book your ride and share it with others heading your way.

Using the Cool Ride-Pooling app, you can:
- Request a ride
- Get picked up at the closest corner to you
- Share your journey with others heading in the same direction!
- Pay for your ride 
 
How does Cool Ride-Pooling work?

It's as easy as ABC! Download the app and create your profile. Use the map to select your pickup and drop-off points. Request a ride, and our real-time algorithm will match you to the nearest driver going towards your destination. Our app will prompt you with the closest convenient corner to meet your driver. 

What are the benefits?
- Affordable prices for everyone. Benefit even further by getting a free ride after every 5 rides booked!
- Efficient on-demand rides straight to your destination
- Superior live support whenever you need it
- Reduced congestion and carbon emissions, so you‚Äôre doing your bit for the environment.
 
Currently, Cool Ride-Pooling is operating in these localities: Attard, Balzan, Birguma, Birkirkara, Blata l-Bajda, Fleur-de-Lys, Floriana, Gharghur, Gwardamangia, Gzira, Hamrun, Ibragg, Iklin, Imriehel, Kappara, Lija, Madliena, Marsa, Msida, Swatar, Swieqi, Paceville, Pembroke, Pieta, Qormi, Qui Si Sana, San Gwann, Sliema, St. Andrews, St. Julians, St. Venera, Ta Giorni, Ta Paris, Ta Xbiex, Tal-Handaq, and Valletta. 

More localities will be available shortly.

comments: Used this for awhile but after 2 really bad experiences I decided to stop using them. Pickup points are always a walk away in strange not logic places and not always safe. One of the issues was not being picked up because driver went wrong road where only 1 way traffic is allowed and thought it bothersome in the rain to drive around to the right place. Second incident was probably app-tech issue giving different drop off point then requested and curt driver.

Excellent app with great service. True that they do not span the whole area of Malta, but for those who live within their zone, 5 euro per trip with frequent discounts is a bargain. Drivers normally punctual and friendly. App works well.
Good service for a great price. Would highly suggest downloading it.
You should offer a way for customers to pay in cash most definitely. Also approximate times of pick up, I feel it's a good app and service but needs improvement.

This app has a lot of potential but fails completely for the simple reason it is only available in a small central area for pick up and drop off. Really only useful to people who live and work in Sliema.

comments: First of, I hardly ever review things, but this one is certainly worth it! I had used the "Evie" launcher for a long time, so I was hesitant to try a new launcher. Got to say though, this one turned me! I really love the XOS Launcher. It's easy, convenient, and FAST! Edit: I just wish there was an "upgrade to premium" option that would do away with the ads send "Give us a 5 star rating!" Pop-up.

Xos launcher to me is the best launcher ever produced. I applaude the creators of this app, but I would like to request if you can add any font effect that would occur generally for all apps and not for home screen. I mean font that if implemented would work on all apps like Facebook, WhatsApp , Instagram , Twitter and all. I would be expecting a feed back( infinix hot 6)

Good launcher. But after the recent update, the appearance of a few widgets (especially the Google play music) wasn't cool. The launcher should be adaptive. Now everything is either dark or transparent. Meaning if I use a dark theme or wallpaper finding a few functions or icon becomes difficult. Pls fix. However it's a good app just needs a few tweaks. Cheers

It's a really good launcher but please fix the slowness problem when it comes to after an update and make sure that after restarting the system it does not take too much time to load as this is annoying and irritating.Make sure android version is truly compatible for its various applications.If this is all fixed then the app will be the best launcher of 2020

I am having issues with this app launcher. It came as a default app on my Infinix Hot 7 and i am having real trouble navigating through my phone because the app laucher keeps stopping for no apparent reason. I have granted all permissions but still, problem persist. I am noy happy.

comments: Yikes. I switched from apple to android and boy can i tell you it freaking sucks on android. Theres so many more options and you can actually look up keyboards on iphone. As to where android you can only make a keyboard, you cant look up anything, you can't log in, you don't even have a PROFILE. you can't see others keyboard works. I swear if you fix this, you'll see a good review from me

Theres a tremendous amount of options available with this and appears a lot of effort went into. What keeps it from getting 5 stars, and almost makes it deserve a 3 is A) The EXCESSIVE advertisments, including some that seem to just block half of your screen and have no immediate or apparent way to dismiss! And B)when creating my own keyboard set up the color of the toolbar wasnt quite right and the option to change it was no longer available!! The only recourse was to start from scratch.

Used to work well, until every update recently is just deteriorating it's ability to make sense. It has decided that it doesn't want to capitalise the letter "i" and then continues to make horrible autocorrect predictions that aren't even close. Will even just leave a bunch of nonsense jumbles of letters rather than attempting to correct it to something legible. It's customisable settings are amazing. Which is worth a whole +1 star to what I'd otherwise say is a 1 star -- not worth it -- App.

I used this app for years and now after the new update my keyboards are no longer compatable. It's very annoying and now when I type I can't see where I'm typing because the keyboard doesnt follow it. Unfortunately it looks like I'm going to have to find a new custom keyboard app or something because this app just doesnt work with me anymore

Overall a really good keyboard, I used it on my old phone and recently downloaded it on this one. But sadly there are a few emojis missing (for example the freezing, the sweating and throwing up one). I had them on the keyboard I used before this one so it's not because of my phone. Please add them, and the others in case there's more missing, because I used them quite frequently and now I have to copy and paste them off of WhatsApp.

comments: Just started using this launcher. Here's what I've noticed. It's buttery smooth, feels light on ram consumption and most of the features are useful. I do however find the blinding white background that comes up when searching the app drawer a bit off putting. I wish it was either transparent or black. I also think the Themes & Icon menu could be made a lot less cluttered and laggy. Simpler minimalist designs are always better than bulky graphics and moving tabs. Fix restarts too. Great app.

I gave it 5 stars when I started using it, but I'm gonna lower it, and here's why: I have the Prime version of this launcher, I get to use the gestures and all; I've been using it for three months or so; Why the f*** am I getting ads in it now?! Three months using it and no ad has ever appeared for me, but in the last 24h I'm receiving ads every minute using my phone! I don't wanna use another launcher, cuz this one is really cool. But dude, enough of these ads! Again, I have the Prime version!

This is the best launcher I have used... I have tried many launchers but non of them were good. I was impressed by using this one. But also there are some crashes and bugs even after the new update I wish they in the next update there should be less bugs and crashes other than this, this is the best launcher i have used.... pls fix all the bugs and crashes In the next update

I have been using this launcher since Dec 5, 2019 , as of now it seems ok to me haven't found any issues yet, suits my needs. Since im using a Xiaomi Redmi Note 8 fone that has no drawer this fantastic launcher solve my problem, I updated the miui from MiUI 10 to MiUI 11 still haven't found any issues or problems yet, Im very happy with this launcher and thank you very much to the developer of this app. I really appreciate you guys for the effort you spend making this great app.

A very good and full satisfactory experience with launchers ,highly coustamizable ,it all depends upon ones ability to do so .Great Job to The Developers of the launchers, a bit more addition features will kill any of its other launchers n will be among top 2 as far my knowledge of using this launchers . I am not a professional and not very much into depth but this launcher has all the reasons to ca ter a major se tion of launcher users .Thanks the remarks are subjected to my experience

description:
New Neon Lion Cool Theme is coming! Apply the Neon Lion Cool Theme theme to enjoy more FREE Wallpapers and Themes! Make your phone stylish! 
Neon Lion Cool Theme is our latest free theme with beautiful Neon Lion Cool Theme HD wallpaper and Neon Lion Cool Theme icon pack. The Neon Lion Cool Theme theme is packed with HD Neon Lion Cool Theme wallpapers and exquisite Neon Lion Cool Theme app icons, designed for mobile theme fanatics. Please download the Neon Lion Cool Theme theme now, more surprises are waiting for you to discover!

Come and download the Neon Lion Cool Theme theme for free and make your Samsung, Huawei and any other brands of Android mobile stylish. 

You can enjoy with Neon Lion Cool Theme: 

Cool themes and HD wallpapers
- High quality Images specially designed for your phone
- Brand new beautiful themes updated every day

3D themes 
- Add Neon Lion Cool Theme theme to your 3D theme
- Neon Lion Cool Theme dynamic wallpapers with  a variety of touch gestures, so you can feel the beauty of Neon Lion Cool Theme at your fingertips.
- More 3D themes and dynamic wallpapers with fluid 3D effects, experience today's cutting-edge technology.

Live Wallpapers
- Different live wallpapers, including the gold rose, waterfall and many more. 
- You can also add gestures and particles to the wallpapers to make your phone look cool 

Other benefits: s
- Different variety of themes, wallpaper, app icons and daily updates.
- We provide special designs during festive periods, whether it's Christmas, Halloween and other holidays, we will have a theme for you and everyone, so you can feel the festive atmosphere that  you love.
- Like football, basketball and other sports? Find your favorite sports theme here, along with your favorite celebrities, cartoons, and anything else.
- Experience smooth 3D and HD themes and wallpapers regardless of what phone model you use

How to apply the Neon Lion Cool Theme theme? 
To apply the theme, please install our launcher first. Apply the Neon Lion Cool Theme theme, to make your phone faster, orderly and cool. The original app icons, clock and weather theme of your phone will be replaced by the Neon Lion Cool Theme theme. We have designed many customized themes for popular apps, these include camera apps, social apps, entertainment apps, useful tools and messenger apps. Our app also provides you thousands of themes from other categories, namely cartoon and anime themes, graffiti themes, gold themes, pink themes, black themes, love themes and many more. All of our beautiful themes are free and available at Google Play Store. Download and apply Neon Lion Cool Theme now! There are more sports (football, basketball), games and other beautiful themes waiting for you!

Apply the Neon Lion Cool Theme theme now, to make your phone faster and organized. The original app icons, clock and weather theme of your phone will be replaced by the Neon Lion Cool Theme theme. 
Come and enjoy this Neon Lion Cool Theme theme of your mobile phone. If you have already tired of the boring screen of your phone, please enjoy this Neon Lion Cool Theme theme!

title: Phone Cooler - Pro Cleaner Master App - CPU Cooler
description:
Phone Cooler - Pro Cleaner Master App - CPU Cooler is temperature monitoring and controlling app that detects and closes heavy resource consuming apps to reduce CPU usage and lower phone temperature. cool down

Phone Cooler - Pro Cleaner Master App - CPU Cooler features : 
‚úìReal-time temperature monitoring
Monitors your phone temperature in real time, so you can see the change from moment to moment. When the temperature is too high, Phone Cooler Master - CPU Cooler - Cool Apps will alert you.

‚úìDynamic overheating detection
Analyzes CPU usage dynamically, and detects apps that are overusing system resource to determine the cause for phone overheating. cool app

‚úìOne tap to cool down
Close overheating apps with one simple tap to reduce CPU usage.

‚úìOverheating prevention
Closes apps that are likely to cause temperature rise, and prevents the phone temperature from rising again.
With all these awesome features, Phone Cooler Master - CPU Cooler - Cool Apps is the best choice to detect apps with high CPU usage and close them to make your device cool. In addition, Phone Cooler Master also helps to extend your battery life by clean the RAM and boost your phone speed.

FAQ:
Why does my phone overheat?
Overheating can occur after prolonged use of powerful apps or games, or while running a large number of apps simultaneously. When the phone‚Äôs hardware power consumption rises, it will produce enough heat that you will noticeably feel the phone overheating. cool
What are the harmful effects of my phone overheating?
Very high phone temperatures can cause your device to respond slowly or to crash or restart. Prolonged overheating can accelerate the aging process of the device itself, shortening the lifespan of your phone. More seriously, though, continued prolonged periods of overheating may lead to potential security problems.
If you love our Android battery cool app, please rate us 5 *!

title: Cool School: Read Along with Ms.Booksy
description:
Foster a love of reading with the Cool School: Read Along With Ms. Booksy app for Android! 
Filled with a collection of digital books featuring read-along stories broken into easy reading chapters, children will love learning to read with their favorite Cool School friend, Ms. Booksy!  

Ms. Booksy reads stories filled with  fun, imagination and interactivity to teach kids like no one else can.  Featuring many hilarious titles, our stories encourage kids to ‚ÄúThink a Little Big!‚Äù. We help teach kids to read in a positive way that builds their language and literacy skills and boosts their confidence. 

The app is free to download and comes with 7 free chapters of some of Ms. Booksy‚Äôs favorite tales: Cinderella, Little Red, Aladdin, Snow White, Beauty and the Beast, Rapunzel & The Little Mermaid.  Full stories are available to purchase with new stories being added regularly.
     
Features:
Read-along, interactive stories in a playful, imaginative and encouraging way for kids to discover.
Each story is presented in the ‚Äúread-to-me‚Äù format which highlights words, a proven technique for teaching preschool children to read. 
7 chapters FREE with initial download.
Parents can purchase new chapters from within the app.
Interactive elements on every page
Interactive game play encouraged throughout the stories to keep kids engaged and unlock additional bonus features.  
Carefully selected pre-school age-appropriate content. 
Offline reading (take it with you while you're on trips).
Over 500 minutes of content!  

Additional Content Options:
Full stories can be purchased for $2.99

COOL SCHOOL CONFIDENCE FOR PARENTS:
Cool School is a multi-award-winning YouTube channel from Driver Studios for kids ages 2-8.¬† With over 1M subscribers it is a place where fun and imagination rule!  Whether it's Ms. Booksy reading stories, Drew Pendous sketching out adventures or Crafty Carol showing kids how to build their dreams, Cool School is here to help them Think a Little Big‚Ñ¢Ô∏è and grow a bit more, one episode at a time.

Cool School has won over families everywhere!  Cool School was honored with the 2018 Cynopsis Imagination Awards for Best Preschool Show Exclusively for a Streaming Platform and the 2017 Cynopsis Model D Awards for Best YouTube Original Series.  

https://www.youtube.com/user/coolschool

For further information, please view our terms of use: https://www. HYPERLINK "https://www.driverstudiosent.com/privacy"driver-studios HYPERLINK "https://www.driverstudiosent.com/privacy".com/privacy

title: Cool Reader GL
description:
E-book reader. Read electronic books in a lot of formats.
Uses Cool Reader engine, but with rewritten user interface part, utilizing OpenGL for hardware acceleration.
Optimized for new devices with high screen resolution and tablets.
Some features of old Cool Reader (e.g. text-to-speech and dictionary support) are not yet implemented.
Better OPDS support. 
Better file browser.
TTS (Read Aloud)
Bookmarks.
Dictionaries.
Can be installed together with old Cool Reader - uses separate place to store settings, book positions, and bookmarks.

To add bookmark, long tap on some word, then choose "Add bookmark" from popup menu.

Windows version can be downloaded here: http://sourceforge.net/projects/crengine/files/CoolReader3/cr3-newui-opengl/cr3-win32-qt-opengl-3.3.48.zip/download

Older APK versions available here: https://sourceforge.net/projects/crengine/files/CoolReader3/cr3-newui-opengl/?upload_just_completed=true

How to help to fix crashes:
If application crashes on your device, you can collect system logs after crash with app like CatLog and send it on my email coolreader.org@gmail.com

comments: This is a dynamite epub reader - the best I've used, and trust me - I've tried them all. I have a number of authors who write a series of books, and they're best read in the order they've been written (new situations, new characters, etc). Michael Connelly, David Rosenfelt, and Tana French are just a few such authors. What I do it edit the filename to tell me the order: "1-Book 1 to read," "2-Books 2 to read" etc. That works great - as long as the epub app lets me select books using the file system. But most apps don't do that - they have this fancy 'library' system that shows you the cover, and defaults to the embedded filename. Then I have no idea what the correct read order is. Not good. Secondly, I really like being able to adjust the look of the book - font, font size and color, page color, night mode colors (just a choice of black-white doesn't do it for me). Cool Reader has every adjustment I can think of. And, the final readable page looks so much better than any other reader I've tried! So if either of these situations involved you - consider this app. I don't think you'll be unhappy. I see where someone complains that they want to read PDFs and this app doesn't allow that. But there are many online and free converters to convert any PDF into an epub - or, use Calibre which is totally free.
It doesn't allow PDF format so sad. Most of the books release in PDF format. Look wise it's too good but, you will get likes if you allow PDF. If you won't allow then its waste App for many ppl.
Cannot open epub books more than 2 MB. Just says failed to open. Between 1 and 2 MB just loads forever (waited for minutes, still could not open any book).
Does not appear to support PDF?  Seems like a big oversight. Otherwise relatively clean and simple provided you covert all your pdfs to something else.
One of the best book readers, very customizable. I really enjoy using Cool Reader!

title: Warm Up & Cool Down by Fitify
description:
‚Ä¢ Warm-Up is performed before a performance or practice. it prepares the muscles for vigorous actions. According to ACSM, warm-up should be a five to ten minutes of low- to moderate-level activity.

‚Ä¢ Cooling down is an easy exercise, done after a more intense activity, to allow the body to gradually transition to a resting or near-resting state. Cooling down allows the heart rate to return to its resting rate. A study has shown that athletes who perform an appropriate cool-down are less likely to become injured.

Features

‚Ä¢ over 65 bodyweight exercises
‚Ä¢ Warmup program
‚Ä¢ Cooldown program
‚Ä¢ no equipment needed
‚Ä¢ voice coach
‚Ä¢ clear HD video demonstrations
‚Ä¢ works offline

Custom Workouts
Build your own session with custom workouts. Choose exercises, duration, rest intervals and challenge yourself with your own training. With Fitify you have one custom workout for free.

Fitify Apps
Be stronger, leaner, healthier with Fitify ‚Äì your very own personal trainer.
Check out other Fitify apps with fitness tools (such as Abs & Core, TRX, Kettlebell, Swiss Ball, Foam Roller, Bosu or Resistance band).

comments: This app is great. I have the free version. & I love it. It does exactly what it says. It give u warm ups, & cool downs. U can choose how long u want it to be. It shows you how to do each thing it has a voice to text to tell you when you begin to tell you what to get ready for and nothing more. There are no interrupted ads.

The warm up section features exercises that exist in other fitify apps such as the cardio. I mean if you've got other fitify apps you can litterally use it to put together a warmup set. The cool down part of the app however is spot on. So, since half of the app makes sense, I give it 3 stars.

Theoretically, randomising exercises is a great idea as you do get heartily sick of doing the same warm up and cool down every session. However, the app repeats the same exercises, either consecutively or every other exercise. If I wanted my warm up to be 3 jumping jacks, 2 low jumping jacks and 3 squat and reach, I might as well go for a run. Thank goodness for the fast forward, however annoying it is to keep returning to the phone when I want to concentrate on the exercises.
One of the nice fitness apps. Customizable and less hassle.
I use the free versi√≥n, but it is a valuable addition to my routine. I even use it at work just to get my blood moving and gain some mobility.

title: Be Cool Be Nice App
description:
BE COOL BE NICE¬Æ (BCBN) is a global movement, adopted by influencers, style icons, artists and leaders across the globe.
¬†
BCBN encourages the use of social media in a positive and proactive way, advocating good manners on and offline.
¬†
The Be Cool Be Nice App is FREE‚Ä¶ because the best things in life are free and worth sharing like joy, laughter, pizza (oops‚Ä¶ pizza is not free, but our BCBN app is).¬† The BCBN app is designed to work alongside the¬†BE COOL BE NICE book.
¬†
The Be Cool Be Nice App will allow you to:

*¬† Watch a rapping 3D Cool Leo come to life from your BCBN book cover!
*¬† View exclusive videos from some of the amazing designer contributors
*¬† Discover and complete interactive 3D activities from the pages of the book.
* Take selfies with the face filters of Cool Leo and Fru La Rue
* Photograph your coolest and nicest friends using the selfie booth
* Spread the BCBN message by sharing digital postcards
¬†
¬†
Have fun! And remember‚Ä¶ #BeCoolBeNice #BCBN
¬†
¬†
Tips:
¬†
~ Don‚Äôt forget to turn off the silent mode for video sound to display. Alternatively, you can use earphones.
~Tap SCAN THE PAGE from the home screen and hover your device steadily over the pages with the special logo. Make sure the page is fully visible in your device‚Äôs camera and there is good lighting.
~ Check the instructions on the home screen for more information
¬†



*Caution -¬†Reading and sharing this book and app will result in a sudden and overwhelming desire to inspire niceness online and off...
potential¬†side effects include:¬†the onslaught of giggles,¬†precarious hilariousness,¬†upside down frown syndrome, anti-judgmental-itis, anti-bully-itis¬†& popsicle addiction.

comments: I gave this app a 2 star because I feel bad giving it a 1. The only app it shows that is heating up my phone is THIS app itself, and it's the only one that is listed. The app has helped me so much, because my phone used to freeze because of the high heat temperature
Work's extremely well! Cool's phone down quickly, with one tap. Awesome!!!
Constantly wanting to be rated. This interfeares with my day to day life. Rated you 5 stars and you are STILL at it everytime I try to use my phone. Freaking PITA. Please stop.
